title: Stalker Problems
description: I got an invitation to an illicit club.They say they’ll grant me three wishes.They say they’ll make all my wildest dreams come true.All I have to do is sign the contract.Is it too good to be true? I’m about to find out. Warning: This is my steamiest book yet. Like…super steamy. You’ve been warned. Welcome to the Society…
author: Ivy Smoak
